I've had the following a few times now when I've had XML Buddy text editors with
unsaved changes. Admittedly it could be XML Buddy returning null when it
shouldn't, but...

!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "File Search".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at

	at
org.eclipse.search.internal.core.text.TextSearchVisitor.evalNonFileBufferDocuments(TextSearchVisitor.java:128)
	at
org.eclipse.search.internal.core.text.TextSearchVisitor.process(TextSearchVisitor.java:99)
	at
org.eclipse.search.internal.core.text.TextSearchEngine.search(TextSearchEngine.java:61)
